items.title: Create project timeline
items.description: Outline all major milestones and deliverables.

items.title: Assign team roles and responsibilities
items.description: Ensure every member has a clear understanding of their tasks.

items.title: Complete feature implementation
items.description: Ensure all features in the scope are built and tested.

items.title: Code review
items.description: Conduct thorough code reviews across all modules.

items.title: QA testing
items.description: Perform end-to-end testing to ensure quality.

items.title: Check the release notes
items.description: Make sure the production environment is set and stable.

items.title: Deploy production environment
items.description: Make sure the production environment is set and stable.

items.title: Notify stakeholders
items.description: Inform all relevant stakeholders of the launch details.

items.title: Post-launch evaluation
items.description: Assess performance and collect user feedback.
